title: UI Health Check Response
description: Schema for UI service health check responses. UI services MUST include api_connectivity to report their connection status to the backend API.

status.description: Overall health status of the UI service

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the health check

api_connectivity.description: REQUIRED: Information about the UI's connection to its backend API

connected.description: Whether the UI can successfully reach the API

api_url.description: The API URL the UI is attempting to connect to

last_check.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last connectivity check

error.description: Error message if connection failed, null if successful

latency_ms.description: Round-trip latency in milliseconds, null if connection failed
